list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: make or allow (something) to become thoroughly wet by immersing it in liquid.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: soak the beans overnight in water
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: ngâm đậu qua đêm trong nước

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: impose heavy charges or taxation on.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Bạn tiếp tục ngâm trong các quán rượu

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an act of immersing someone or something in liquid for a period of time.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I'm looking forward to a long soak in the tub
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi đang mong đợi một cơn đắm mình trong bồn tắm

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: his daughter stayed up to put the old soak to bed
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: con gái của anh ta thức dậy để ngâm mình lên giường
